document_data.name: Faceless Eyes of the Zhentarim
document_data.creator: [[Zhentarim]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Faceless Eyes of the Zhentarim''' was a style of hood that completely covered the wearer's face except for their eyes.
document_data.Reputation: This hood was immediately recognizable as a symbol of the [[Zhentarim]], and commanded respect accordingly. It was worn by [[assassin]]s, and the sight of their eyes through the mask could be a source of fear.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Naomlen Girdaur]], a [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[rogue]] who worked as an [[adventurer]] in [[Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
